WorkItem.Description: Sometimes Custom Updates have almost identical or completely identical steps in the Custom Update Creator. It would be nice to be able to save a series of Custom Update elements to a file and load a file to populate the Custom Update Creator with elements that are already configured or almost configured.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: saved configurations for Custom Updates

Comments.Message: Since an XML file is generated already, although in a temporary location, most of the work would probably involve reading the file back in and populating the view with the configuration, that and selecting a place to save the custom update XML files. I'd suggest "\Saved Custom Updates", to continue in the same fashion after the "Saved Rules" XML files.
Hi Austinian, thanks for your sugestion, in WPP V2 you will be able to save custom updates as templates and load it later.
